name: Cronos World
introduce: Cronos World is a platform that aims to provide a diverse product portfolio for serving multiple purposes on the Cronos network. It is an “all in one platform for Cronos Ecosystem”. The contribution of CronosWorld to the Cronos chain includes a Decentralized exchange (DEX), an NFT marketplace, a launchpad, and an incubator for Cronos’s chain-based project. Moreover, the platform is also planning to launch a Game-Fi.
